commands.name: specsarealie
commands.message: It is recommended that you do not directly look the specifications advertised by laptop manufacturers, as the implementation of such specifications matter. Laptop specs do not tell the entire story. Many laptops boast impressive specifications and do not perform well. For evidence, look at ASUS's gaming lines before 2020.

commands.name: dontasktoask
commands.message: Please don't ask to ask a question. It wastes time for everyone involved, since we have to reply to your original question just to find out what you're trying to ask in the first place. https://dontasktoask.com/
